The free Streamlabs Controller app allow: The free Streamlabs Controller app allows you to control Streamlabs Desktop from your iOS or Android device. You must be logged in to use this feature.
Some third party applications connect to: Some third party applications connect to Streamlabs Desktop via websockets connection. Toggle this to allow such connections and display connection info.
Warning: Displaying this portion on stre: Warning: Displaying this portion on stream may leak sensitive information.
